page.title: 10PARKWOOD SCHOOL
page.content:
Our school is a large and modern one. It was rebuilt about six years ago after a fire destroyed much of the original building. Each classroom is separate and they are positioned in pairs. Most of the equipment is new and there are about 400 juniors in thirteen classes.
There is a separate infant school just across the school playground. The children come to this school when they are seven and stay until they are eleven. At that age they move onto a number of different secondary schools.
